article_title: Kentucky Agriculture Department, DEA reach deal on hemp seeds; planting could come soon
article_text: A week after suing the federal government for the release of a shipment of hemp seeds to plant, the Kentucky Department of Agriculture appears to be on the verge of getting its seeds.
